 2004-01632004-03-08,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of PAUL CÔTÉ, currently the Chief Operating Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to be President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, effective March 5, 2004.
